projects.title: CodeSync Collaborative Code Editor
projects.name: CodeSync
projects.description: CODESYNC is a real-time collaborative coding environment with an integrated whiteboard and AI chat. The project focuses on real-time synchronization and conflict resolution to create a seamless user experience.
project_details: Built a real-time collaborative coding environment that integrates a whiteboard and an AI chat using the Gemini API.
Optimized synchronization latency by 30% using Liveblocks metrics and the Convex reactive database.
Implemented throttling and conflict-free resolution mechanisms, which reduced editing conflicts by 50%.
Designed a role-based permission system that enables room owners to manage user access and privileges.

projects.title: Hackverse (Hackathon Organizing Platform)
projects.name: Hackverse (Under Development)
projects.description: Hackverse is a scalable and secure hackathon hosting platform that demonstrates my proficiency in full-stack development and adherence to SOLID principles. The project posed several challenges, including implementing robust user authentication and designing a normalized database schema.
project_details: Developed secure Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) using Passport.js, NestJS guards, and decorators, ensuring granular permission management and robust user authentication.
Designed and optimized a highly normalized PostgreSQL database schema using Prisma ORM, enhancing data storage efficiency and retrieval performance.
Architected a cohesive full-stack application utilizing PostgreSQL (via Neon), React (via Next.js), and Node.js (via NestJS), ensuring scalability and maintainability.
Implemented Redux for global state management, ensuring consistent state across the application and improving user experience.

projects.title: Medicare Simplified
projects.name: Medicare Simplified
projects.description: Medicare Simplified is an e-commerce platform for medicine that showcases my expertise in React and Next.js. The project involved migrating from React.js to Next.js, implementing server-side rendering, and integrating a secure authentication system.
project_details: Spearheaded the migration of the web application from React.js to Next.js, leveraging server-side rendering and API routing to enhance performance and SEO.
Implemented Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) using NextAuth.js and Prisma ORM, providing differentiated user experiences for admin and regular users.
Developed and maintained both front-end and back-end components, ensuring seamless integration between Next.js, PostgreSQL, and extended with Supabase or Neon.
Optimized application performance and user experience, resulting in improved load times and user engagement.

projects.title: Crab Clean
projects.name: Crab Clean
projects.description: 300 downloads!! Crab Clean is a CLI tool used to declutter your system by identifying unused and duplicate files, as well as grouping files for better organization.
project_details: Developed a CLI tool in Rust to efficiently scan and identify unused and duplicate files on the system.
Implemented file grouping functionality to organize files based on user-defined criteria.
Optimized performance for large-scale file systems, ensuring quick and accurate results.

projects.title: Journal Application
projects.name: Journal Application
projects.description: Journal Application is a decentralized Web3-based journaling platform that leverages blockchain technology for secure and immutable record-keeping.
project_details: Developed a decentralized journaling platform using Ethereum blockchain and IPFS for secure and immutable record-keeping.
Implemented smart contracts in Solidity to manage journal entries and ensure data integrity.
Integrated React and Next.js for a seamless and responsive user interface.
Optimized the application for Web3 interactions, including wallet integration and transaction handling.
